thread.title: 'Back to the Future' fans transform town into Hill Valley
thread.title_full: 'Back to the Future' fans transform town into Hill Valley

title: 'Back to the Future' fans transform town into Hill Valley
text: > Top News 'Back to the Future' fans transform town into Hill Valley "Back To The Future" fans, from left, Shannon Burckhard, Kathy Degoutrie and Markus Geiberger pose in front of posters during Fillmore's celebration of the movie franchise on Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015, in Fillmore, Calif. Burckhard, dressed as Marty McFly, was visiting from Camby, Ore., while Degoutrie and Geiberger traveled from Germany to be part of the celebration. (Anthony Plascencia/The Ventura County Star via AP) LOS ANGELES DAILY NEWS OUT; MANDATORY CREDIT
